body.name: Yaheetech Modren Club Chair with Ottoman Set, Comfy Fabric Accent Arm Chair with Foot Rest, Upholstered Barrel Chair for Living Room Bedroom, Letter Print
deliveryMessages: $39.99 delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 43 mins.
features: STURDY CONSTRUCTION: The club chair and ottoman set are crafted with plywood and solid wood frame and upholstered with foam filled seat. Covered in quality fabric, this non-shedding, durable and sturdy chair can take up to 136 kg/299.8 lb, and the ottoman is capable of holding 110 kg/242.5 lb.

EXTRA COMFORTABLE: Our barrel chair with ottoman is built for utmost comfort. 18.9 inches (width) x 19.9 inches (depth) seat and 12.2-inch height backrest provide you a larger sitting area and stronger support. Designed for ultimate comfort, the ottoman stuffed with foam is a good place to rest your feet and relax.

EYE-CATCHING&LUXURIOUS: The club chair and ottoman are featured with straight and curved silhouettes and finished in velvet/linen fabric upholstery, bringing an elegant and welcoming tone to your room. The curved back design and sleek track arms of the chair create a barrel shape for a contemporary look. The barrel shape of the chair well matched with the semicircle ottoman, this stylish set will stand out in any room.
【U-shaped Back Design】Our accent barrel chair adopts the U-shaped backrest design for more comfort, embracing you with softness and relieving your fatigue and tiredness.

【Solidly Built for Long-term Use】Elevated on four hard plastic legs, this cute accent chair set is crafted from a blend of solid and manufactured wood, with a weight capacity of 300lbs for the chair, and 243lbs for the ottoman.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yaheetech Club Chair and Ottoman Set for Living Room Chair Feel tired when sitting upright for a long time? With an extra ottoman, you can comfortably lean back on the mid-height backrest with your feet up while reading or sipping a cup of coffee.

The curved frame and skin-friendly upholstery lend an upscale sensibility to the piece, making this chair set ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, reading nooks, guest rooms, or for commercial use in the beauty salon, hotel, and suchlike.

Thick Cushioned Seat Upholstered with high-density foam which will not easily get collapsed after long time use, thick and firm Round Armrest The round armrest perfectly lines up with your arms for better resting your arms Curved Backrest Curved backrest fits your body well for relieving pressure and fatigue
For Bedroom For Living Room For Lounge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great look and value for the cost.
reviews.reviewText: I placed this adorable chair and ottoman in my bedroom. It’s on the small side so it was perfect fit for the sloped ceiling. It’s very comfy and perfect for cozying up with a book and a cup of tea. I couldn’t love it any more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little set!
reviews.reviewText: Very nicely packed and easy to assemble legs and you’re done. Fits in any room. Fills an empty spot nicely. Seems very durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this chair for my room it’s comfy but super small!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pictures do no justice to this piece. It is the perfect size for the space I needed it in. It is a smaller piece great for office, classroom, game room, bedroom. It is super sturdy and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Is really cute for a kids room. But it's so small. Not a comfortable chair at all. Perfect for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful accent chair
reviews.reviewText: Gave my daughter’s room a refresh and this chair checked all the boxes. It’s smaller(she’s petite), has a matching ottoman, white boucle fabric, barrel style and matches the design of the room. It was a surprise and she LOVES it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Barrel Chair & Ottoman
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair and ottoman in the brown color to fill a small space in my den. It’s cute and was easy to attach the legs. It shipped quickly and I love the look of it. If you’re looking for comfort in a chair, don’t buy it because it’s very stiff, but it’s fine for extra seating and short term sitting. It was exactly what I was looking for and the price was right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars buying a rolex watch on the street is a better value and less deceptive
reviews.reviewText: I know this is long, but do yourself a favor and read it before you throw your money away. I've never bought furniture online before, but i really loved this and the fact that it had 4 stars and it said the shipping was $19.99, I took a chance. I was willing to risk 20 bucks in return shipping fee. That was the start of my worst shopping experience EVER.This is so cute and I wanted so much to love it. But no matter how hard I tried I could not overlook the ridiculously poor quality. I don't even know where to start. Maybe the petroleum smell. That's what hits you first and it does NOT get better even after 2 weeks airing out. The padding is so thin and cheap you can feel the frame cut into your lower back when you sit in it. Most uncomfortable chair I ever sat on. The fabric feels almost like vinyl. The picture shows my heel marks in the ottoman a week later. I tried it out-sat in it less than two minutes. The construction is so light, my 2yo grandchild bumped into the ottoman as she walked by it and knocked it right over. she stopped, picked it right back up, and went on her way without any effort. She's 2 and she lifted it with one hand. The materials are so cheap, it does not seem likely it will stand up to normal use for more than a few months. As much as I wanted to keep it, it just was not worth the price. The worst of this nightmare was about to hit.I packed it up for the return. It did not fit in my car, so I had to wait for a friend with a large vehicle to bring it to UPS. First tried the local Staples that has a UPS station inside. They refused the box because it was too big. Next, we went to an actual UPS store in the next town. I thought the shipping would be $19.99 since that was the shipping cost indicated by the seller. Turns out the return shipping costs almost $150! That's the price of the chair. It's almost as if the seller flipped the prices and was hoping the cost of ship would discourage returns. For the life of me, I can't understand the 4 star rating.BTW-Amazon was really helpful in bringing this nightmare to an end.
